Observation-level footnotes: 1.The shifting work culture caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, led many businesses to adopt remote working methods. As some opted for mobile broadband, others opted for fixed broadband.     2. The shift in work cultures and digitisation of small businesses has also coincided with increased customer onboarding and promotional broadband campaigns in 2020 by different MNOs such as Liquid Telecom.
